gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT]: Meteoblue contradicts the baseline, but data from YR.no and Météo France isn't available. Meteoblue suggests slightly lower temperatures (11.1°C vs 9.9°C avg) and no rain, compared to the baseline's 51% chance. A classic spring day in Paris, perhaps it's time for a walk along the Seine, even a monkey would enjoy it.
